description:
Minami-chan and her friends are visiting Mai-chan’s vacation home.
Mana-chan, Mai-chan’s sister, welcomes them. 
Minami-chan is excited when she sees the spacious room that looks like a suite.
“Maybe this is what a honeymoon is like?”
It’s the beginning of a fun summer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Slumber Party at the Vacation Home
